name: Jump (itch) (nonygl)
description:
This game was made in 4 days during Unity education. 

It is a mobile game.

In the game, you jump from platform to platform in a randomly generated level. The longer you hold your finger on the screen the higher and further you jump, but you have a maximum jump height.

Made by: Nino Potrkač

Mentor: Dominik "Cwekii" Cvetkovski
